nested_items.name: ImportSource
nested_items.description: The source S3 bucket for the import.

nested_items.name: S3LocationUri
nested_items.description: The URI for the source S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: S3BucketRegion
nested_items.description: The Region associated with the source S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: S3BucketAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM ARN role used to access the source S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: Destinations
nested_items.description: The ARN of the destination event data store.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the import's creation.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the import's last update.

nested_items.name: StartEventTime
nested_items.description: Used with EndEventTime to bound a StartImport request, and limit imported trail events to only those events logged within a specified time period.

nested_items.name: EndEventTime
nested_items.description: Used with StartEventTime to bound a StartImport request, and limit imported trail events to only those events logged within a specified time period.

nested_items.name: ImportStatistics
nested_items.description: Returns information on the stopped import.

nested_items.name: PrefixesFound
nested_items.description: The number of S3 prefixes found for the import.

nested_items.name: PrefixesCompleted
nested_items.description: The number of S3 prefixes that completed import.

nested_items.name: FilesCompleted
nested_items.description: The number of log files that completed import.

nested_items.name: EventsCompleted
nested_items.description: The number of trail events imported into the event data store.
